rule_text: The text of the Xxcha promissory note 'Political Favor' should read as follows:   'When an agenda is revealed: Remove 1 token from the Xxcha playerâ€™s strategy pool and return it to his reinforcements. Then, discard the revealed agenda and reveal 1 agenda from the top of the deck. Players vote on this agenda instead. Then, return this card to the Xxcha player.'
